name: Snaphost_Windows_Process_Listening_Port
pattern: {"query": "select p.name, p.path, lp.port, lp.address, lp.protocol  from listening_ports lp LEFT JOIN processes p ON lp.pid = p.pid WHERE lp.port != 0 AND p.name != '';", "interval": 28800, "description": "Returns the Listening port List - ATT&CK T1043,T1090,T1094,T1205,T1219,T1105,T1065,T1102", "platform": "windows", "snapshot": true}
